metadata.name: rektguyz secured
metadata.description:
Ledger collaborated with artist OSF to commemorate the launch of Ledger Stax at Ledger Op3n Paris 2022.

OSF is a digital artist based in London, UK. His art uses bright lights and glitch-like animation effects to depict characters known as “rektguy” in various city settings. Rektguy itself has grown into a web3 brand, celebrating the idea of “rekt culture” within the world of crypto and NFTs.
